metadata.name: (vase)
metadata.description:
I started this project in Tuesday,May 10,2011 , I had made my decision, I wanted to paint for blind people, I had produced an interesting output in the unseen world of the blind, I produced it again.
An interesting thing happened.
All painting exhibitions that have been held so far were for sighted people, but this time my painting exhibition was for blind people. ).
A more interesting event
 All the blind people easily touched and saw my paintings, but the sighted people hardly touched and understood.
I made another decision
Anyone who buys an NFT from my braille, the physical version of that NFT will be given to a blind person. By doing this, you have bought a valuable work and also help a blind person to see a painting. you did.
Can you accompany me on this path?
Certainly, other decisions will be made on the way to the evolution of this project.
blind sight
Maryam Rashghi
